choices.C: is supported on all devices and operating systems
choices.B: requires a PIN, password, or passphrase
choices.D: is less secure than form-based authentication

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
Agree with A and B

Selected Answer: AB
should be A and B

questions.question_text: What are two characteristics of Smart Card Authentication for Cisco UC Applications? (Choose two.)

A collaboration engineer is troubleshooting an issue with Cisco Jabber for Windows. On-premises users report that they cannot check voicemail and do not receive notifications of new messages in the client. In the Phone Accounts information in the Jabber client, the authentication information is not accepted. What is the cause of the issue?

choices.C: The user has incorrect permissions to access the voicemail.
choices.D: The voicemail pilot is not configured.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
I think it is D

Selected Answer: B
from this link, the option B seem is correct
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/unified-communications/unity-connection/116940-problemsolution-product-00.html.

Selected Answer: A
Maybe the option A is correct.
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/unified-communications/jabber/212471-jabber-login.html

Selected Answer: D
D. 302

A 302 Found response code indicates a temporary redirection. Cisco UCM uses this code to redirect the client to the IdP during the SAML Single Sign-On (SSO) process.

Selected Answer: D
see Fig 1 Step 3

choices.E: Select Enable High Availability and click Save.
choices.D: Add IMPSub as a secondary presence server in the redundancy group.
choices.B: Replace IMPPub with IMPSub in the redundancy group.
choices.A: Add a new presence redundancy group and click Save.
choices.C: Click Save and restart the Cisco Presence Engine.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer must configure Cisco IM and Presence server high availability so that the publisher node fails over to the subscriber node if the publisher node becomes unavailable. On the Presence Redundancy Group Configuration page, the engineer receives this message: “High availability is not enabled for this cluster.” Which two actions must the engineer perform to resolve the issue? (Choose two.)
An administrator is configuring Cisco Unity Express and is using the default Auto-Attendant script, aa.aef. Which script parameter prevents the script from transferring callers to external numbers?
